content.rendered:
• Home
  • Shop and Establishment

Shop and Establishment

Shop and Establishment Registration in Bangalore

Then is the certificate to be issued by the labour department of the respective state for their labour details of commercial establishment. We are acting as one of the best firm who does shop and establishment registration in Bangalore.

Documents required

  • PAN
  • ID Proof
  • Address Proof
  • Circle & Range

 

Letter Heads requesting authority to issue certificate and authorizing auditor to collect the certificate and authorizing auditor to collect the certificate.

Time Duration:

3 to 4 working days.

Our Methodology
  • Submission of documents
  • Processing
  • Obtaining certificate

Quick Links

  • GST consultants in Bangalore
  • Income Tax
  • Book Keeping Services
  • Company Registration
  • Shop and Establishment

  • Partnership Registration
  • Import & Export
  • Loan Property Consultants

Get in touch

Gururaj Associates has been established since 2001, with a vision of reaching Income Tax Services to the people who are in small and medium sector.

Contact Us

Transform Potential into Success – Schedule Your Consultation Today!
